answers.answer: I am 12 weeks and I suffer from migraines and since ive been preg I have them frequently to the point ive had husband take me to er. They give me a narcotic to get rid of them. Otherwise im told to just take Tylenol but no more than 4000 mg a day
OK I just wants make sure there nothing wrong
I had them as well. My ob prescribed me some pills and it helped alot. But mine would last for days....how many weeks are you?
I get them all the time!! I wake up with them but Tylenol helps alot
Sure do. Panadol is safe to take but keep clear of nurofen/ibuprofen.
your ob can give you something
Headaches are normal but if you take medicine and it doesn't go away then that's a sign or early preeclampsia and u need to go to the doctor

Yeah What ce5ce.  I get them alot since Like The 6th week and now 29 weeks. Drink lots of water. I find That When I drink ice water It helps.  I freeze half a gallon of water, fill It up The rest of The way with room temp water and put It in The fridge and drink It daily right from The gallon lolz.  Since I started doing That I noticed less headaches.
I have been getting alot. When pregnant our sinuses are inflammed, so sinus headaches are common.
